Name: SKULLMASTER'S ARENA
About the game: Deep in the bowels of earth lives the Skullmaster, an evil wizard who rules over the land and terrorizes the innocent. The time has come to enter the Skullmaster's arena, destroy his minions and put an end to the tyranny. This is a game about running, dodging and shooting stuff. Blast your way through different arenas, defeat the evil Skullmaster and escape quickly to earn a spot on the hiscore.
